amendment.description: To modify the repeal of sunset provision.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2211 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2211 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S1771; text: CR S1771) To modify the repeal of sunset provision.
